snippet: It is “almost impossible” that ski and snowboard test events for the 2018 Pyeongchang Olympics set for next year will go ahead because of delays at the sites, said Gian-Franco Kasper.
abstract: International Ski Federation Pres Gian-Franco Kasper says that snowboard test events for the 2018 Pyeongchang Olympics are unlikely to happen.
lead_paragraph: It is “almost impossible” that ski and snowboard test events for the 2018 Pyeongchang Olympics set for next year will go ahead because of delays at the sites, said Gian-Franco Kasper.

headline.main: Test Events in Pyeongchang Unlikely to Meet Schedule
